Posts.Content: Katidid193 wrote: The report said 1.2 x 1.4 x 2.5 ccm. What the heck.does that mean. Had my biopsy yesterday. .biopsied tumor and one lymph node. Doctor positive it is Idc.now I want to jump out. Of my skin. I cannot see past.tomorrow. I feel like I have cancer everywhere and I will be dead in 6 months. Hope all these feelings are normal but the.waiting just makes me want to throw up. Dx 3/13/2017, IDC, Left, 1cm, Stage IB, Grade 2, 0/20 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Surgery 5/1/2017 Mastectomy: Left Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: What size is my tumor Katidid193 MTwoman

Posts.Content: Mar 20, 2017 01:03AM - edited Mar 20, 2017 01:05AM by Katidid193 so the diagnosis was idc 2.5cmm tumor and the biopsy of the suspicious lymph node was positive. Truley terrified and cannot stop crying or thinking that I am infested with cancer. I hope all these feelings are normal. Still have to wait a week before seeing the surgeon. Not even sure how I feel except defective and just want this thing out of me.

Posts.Content: Mar 28, 2017 12:00AM Katidid193 wrote: Don't understand why they wait so long to start tests. I am.terrified snd all.I can think.is.that every.ache pain cough is the cancer.spreading everywhere. All i.do is sob thinking after next week I will never see my.grandson again . .I have been told I have a 2.5 cmm tumor with I'd and one.suspicious lymph node that also tested positive for idc. The wait is agonizing snd.I can't shut my brain off. I am sure I will be dead in 6 months. This is.horrible.

Posts.Title: after surgery Katidid193 Luckynumber47

Posts.Content: Katidid193 wrote: so i have.had my biopsy (1 2.5 cm pos for idc and 1 pos lymph node). Had my breast mri - right breast clear, left breast with tumor + pos lump node and now I need another biopsy for small focus spot near the tumor ) had the bone and ct scans both negative ) now waiting for surgery and all I can think is that every ache and pain is more cancer spreading. I am going nuts. And.I feel totally exhausted. Anyone else.go through.this. its.absolutely driving me insane. Can't seem to function normal. Ugh!
